project.name: MapComplete Open Shop Map
project.description: An editable map with basic shop information

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Open Shop Map has a layer Shop showing features with this tag

The layer 'Shop allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Shop allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Shop allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Shop allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'Shop' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows and asks freeform values for key 'shop' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows shop=agrarian with a fixed text, namely 'Farm Supply Shop' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')

The MapComplete theme Open Shop Map has a layer pharmacy showing features with this tag

The layer 'pharmacy allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
